text: Potana prana ane dhana vade allahana margamam jehada karanara imanavala'o ane karana vagara besi rahenara imanavala'o banne sarakha nathi, potana dhana ane prana vade jehada karanarane besi rahenara para allaha ta'ala'e darajjamam ghani ja sresthata api rakhi che ane ama to allaha ta'ala'e darekane krpa ane sara valataranum vacana api rakhyum che, parantu jehada karanara'one besi rahevavala para khuba ja mota valatarani sresthata api rakhi che
